profile.name: David Dias
profile.headline: @DavidDiasDigital | Senior Software Engineer | Toronto, Canada
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for building scalable and maintainable applications. Proficient in a range of programming languages and technologies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @DavidDiasDigital
description: Designed and developed multiple Node.js CLI tools for efficient data management and automation.
Built a self-hosted bookmark manager with robust security features and user-friendly interface.
Created an ecommerce UI component library using TypeScript, ensuring seamless integration with existing applications.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a blog CMS using JavaScript and Node.js for a client-based project.
Created an open-source repository for a Node.js CLI tool, contributing to its growth and community engagement.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated multiple open-source repositories for various projects, ensuring their continued relevance and quality.
